full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSANGS KYI CHOG DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR BA 'O MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @045B (CES BSANGS KYI CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR 'O MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,RIGS RUS TSE 'BRANG SOGS YON TAN DU MA'I DPAL GYIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, ,KHYAD PAR RYGAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN LA MI BYED PA'I DAD @046A *, ,PA DANG LDAN PA, ,RNAM DPYOD PA'I MIG GA-YAS GA-YO BA SHES BYA'I DKYIL 'KHOR MTHA' DAG LA GZIGS PA GSAL BA SOGS, ,DAM PAS BSNGAGS YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, ,LCANG RA NAG SDE PA RIN PO CHE DOON GRUB RAB BRTAN SKU MCHED KYI BKA' BSKUL BA LA SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, ,PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN GYUR CIG , SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
